title: Thunderbird 115 Supernova: Here’s What’s New
description:
Thunderbird 115 Supernova has arrived! Embrace its stunning new design and improved features to streamline your email workflow.

The post Thunderbird 115 Supernova: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Linux Kernel 6.3 Reaches End of Life — Users Urged to Upgrade
description:
Linux kernel 6.3 has reached its end of life. Users are urged to upgrade their systems to the lastes Linux kernel 6.4 as soon as possible.

The post Linux Kernel 6.3 Reaches End of Life — Users Urged to Upgrade appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Oracle takes on Red Hat in Linux code fight
description:
Oracle declares that it will always make the binaries and source code for its Linux distribution publicly and freely available.

The post Oracle takes on Red Hat in Linux code fight appeared first on Linux Today.

title: SUSE Announces Free RHEL Fork to Preserve Choice in Enterprise Linux
description:
SUSE announced that it will fork Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) and develop it to be available to everyone without any restrictions.

The post SUSE Announces Free RHEL Fork to Preserve Choice in Enterprise Linux appeared first on Linux Today.

title: fwupd 1.9.3 Adds Support for More Thunderbolt 4 Docks
description:
New in fwupd 1.9.3 is support for the Belkin Thunderbolt 4 Core Hub dock, TUXEDO InfinityBook Pro 13 v3 laptop, and more.

The post fwupd 1.9.3 Adds Support for More Thunderbolt 4 Docks appeared first on Linux Today.
